item.title: Fix Captive Portal Issue
item.description: macOS Mojave sometimes can’t connect to WIFI networks with a captive portal I’m not sure if this is just macOS Mojave being flaky or some interaction with the security malware installed on my work laptop, but it refuses to connect to some captive portals. The problem is that it refuses to render the captive portal login page, so you can’t agree to their TOS, and don’t get a DHCP address.
